column4: ok people, Ubuntu + Unitity minimize xchat and it does not go to the so called taskbar. Any fix or easy work arround ?
someone came in here with that problem yesterday
its like it becomes a hidden task
do you have it to minimize to the tray?
that's the thing, the application indicator area in natty is not the tray
the tray is in fact hidden by default
ok so kill that option in xchat and all should be good ?
ok lol now i need to figure out howto disable min to tray lol
if you want, you can unhide the tray for a minute, then rehide it
you need to open the terminal and put in the following line
<tensorpudding> thnx i well try that Best regards!
to reset it back to normal, you do gsettings reset com.canonical.Unity.Panel systray-whitelist
